long_description: we run jewellery making courses in an exciting, versatile material called precious metal clay (pmc). this material enables individuals with no prior silversmithing experience to produce fantastic designs in pure silver (99.9%). although the courses are specifically designed to enable absolute beginners to produce fantastic results we tailor each course to the abilities of the participants. the trouble is, you're costing me a fortune ransacking car boot sales etc... looking for things to mould.

generated_description: learn silver clay is a company based in lewes, england, specializing in providing jewelry making courses using precious metal clay (pmc). the company offers both in-person and online courses designed for beginners, allowing participants to create silver jewelry without prior silversmithing experience. the courses are conducted in a fully equipped workshop in the sussex countryside, with a maximum of six participants per group. learn silver clay also supplies pmc and art clay silver, as well as jewelry making tools and equipment.
